Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In "Live Free or Die Hard," the fourth chapter in the high-octane action franchise, a mastermind cyber-criminal holds America hostage by wreaking havoc via the Internet. It's a great thriller, but could this imagined scenario ever happen in real life?

Clip.Title: THE ORIGINS OF OZ
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of Dorothy's adventures in Oz have been seen and read by millions. Now learn the true story of the man behind the curtain, author L. Frank Baum.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he takes you behind the scenes to examine the treasures, secret symbols, and coded messages that you can find at the Smithsonian. With the help of curators and other experts, we unlock some of the Smithsonian's most compelling mysteries.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he goes behind the scenes to the Smithsonian Tropical Research Institute in Panama to track sloths; search the Panama Canal for clues to the creation of the Panamanian Isthmus; and rise sixteen stories atop the rainforest in a construction crane to do bug research.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In "Live Free or Die Hard," the fourth chapter in the high-octane action franchise, a mastermind cyber-criminal holds America hostage by wreaking havoc via the Internet. It's a great thriller, but could this imagined scenario ever happen in real life?

Clip.Title: THE ORIGINS OF OZ
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of Dorothy's adventures in Oz have been seen and read by millions. Now learn the true story of the man behind the curtain, author L. Frank Baum.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The west coast of Newfoundland is a story of cultural history and beauty - from the first European settlements at l'Anse aux Meadows and Port au Choix, to the incredible, scenic beauty of Gros Morne National Park.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In "Live Free or Die Hard," the fourth chapter in the high-octane action franchise, a mastermind cyber-criminal holds America hostage by wreaking havoc via the Internet. It's a great thriller, but could this imagined scenario ever happen in real life?

Clip.Title: THE ORIGINS OF OZ
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of Dorothy's adventures in Oz have been seen and read by millions. Now learn the true story of the man behind the curtain, author L. Frank Baum.

Clip.Title: WOMEN AMONG WOLVES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This is a story of one woman's passion for wolves. Gudrun Pflueger is an ex world champion cross country skier and long distance runner who is on the search for the coast wolves of British Columbia.

Clip.Title: VENOM ISLANDS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On a string of Southern Indonesian islands, poisonous predators lurk, each with its own toxic cocktail suited to its hunting style. Some bite. Some sting. Some strike quickly, while others deliver their own slow brand of death.

Clip.Title: WANTED ANACONDA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Find out the truth behind the myths of anacondas as a crew of wildlife photographers and biologists sets out on a mission of fact and fiction.

Clip.Title: FACING THE GIANT BEES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In Nepal, men risk their lives in search of honey, the golden liquid valued since the dawn of time: honey. But to reach the treasure, they must confront the giant bees, the largest bee in the world with a potentially fatal sting.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Namibian Villagers are forced to abandon their lands as neighbouring Rivers swell and swallow up entire settlements.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Scientists in Egypt look for ways to slow the alterations caused by the changing environment in the country.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Off the eastern coast of Australia lies the Great Barrier Reef - a natural structure so large it stretches for over 1,200 miles and can be seen from outer space. This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.

Clip.Title: THE PREDATOR COAST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: On southern coast of Africa all must bow to the power of the coastal plain's seasons: a ruthless cycle that has the power to give life and take it away.

Clip.Title: ELEPHANT KING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Mayhem is about to break out in Namibia's Etosha National Park. This sprawling, arid land plays host to the highest concentration of elephants on Earth, and they've recently lost their leader. The quest to become the new elephant king is on, and the candidates are all six-ton giants, willing to throw their weight around.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Bionic Vet and his staff must save a tiny chinchilla that has broken both of his arms and a Labrador puppy that needs a bionic appendage that exactly mirrors his diseased bone to save his life.

This 6,000 year old underwater empire has been built from as many as 400 different species of coral, and holds some of the world's most iconic animals like clownfish, green sea turtles and barracudas.
